maudlin.translation[0].definitions[0].de: talking or behaving in a sad, silly, and emotional way, especially when drunk
maudlin.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Sir Ralph was becoming maudlin after his third glass of claret.
maudlin.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a maudlin song, story, film etc tries too hard to make people feel emotions such as love or sadness and seems silly
maudlin.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a song that is tender without being maudlin
